entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
